Version 2.0.48 - Fix Tag Navigation Resume Position

Bug Fix

  • Fixed: SCORM resuming at slide 1 instead of tag target after tag navigation
  • Storyline's internal state (slide 0) was being written to DB after intercept window
  • suspend_data write intercepts now continue for entire tag navigation session

Technical Details

  • Removed 10-second time limit for suspend_data WRITE intercepts
  • Write intercepts continue as long as tag navigation is active
  • READ intercepts still have time limit (only needed during initialization)
  • Intercepts stop when navigation is superseded (user clicks elsewhere)

Root Cause

  • lesson_location intercept shows slide 13 correctly (no time limit)
  • But Storyline internally starts at slide 0
  • After 10s, Storyline writes suspend_data with slide 0 (unchanged)
  • Fix: keep modifying writes to maintain tag target slide
